name: Caoilte the Asharrow

skills.name: Asharrow
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single-target ATK-scaling damage with 3.7 ATK multiplier
30% Crit Damage buff for 2 turns - stacks with base C.DMG for massive crits

skills.book_value: 2 books total: +10% damage (×2). Low priority - focus A2/A3 first.
skills.notes: Simple but effective A1. C.DMG buff synergizes with all skills for increased damage output. Keep this buff active for A2/A3 nukes.

skills.name: Falling Leaves
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. If the initial target is killed, also attacks the enemy with the lowest HP. Both attacks will ignore 50% of the target's DEF, as well as [Unkillable] and [Block Damage] buffs.

effects.notes: 2-hit attack, 2.1 ATK multiplier per hit. Ignores 50% DEF - MASSIVE against high-DEF targets.
Ignores 50% of target's DEF - bypasses tanky champions like Odin, Leorius
Bypasses Unkillable buffs - perfect counter to unkillable comps
Bypasses Block Damage buffs - ignores defensive mechanics
Conditional: If first target dies, attacks enemy with lowest HP. Chain-kill potential.

skills.book_value: 4 books total: +5% damage (×2), +10% damage, -1 CD. HIGH PRIORITY - brings CD to 4 turns.
skills.notes: SIGNATURE SKILL. Perfect counter to Odin, Leorius, and all unkillable/block damage comps. 50% DEF ignore makes this hit HARD. Chain attack on kill = clean up low HP enemies. Book for 4-turn CD.

skills.name: Torrential Pain
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Each critical hit fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 10% and heals them by 10% of their MAX HP (stacks up to 50%). If this attack kills an enemy, places an [Unkillable] buff on this Champion for 1 turn.

effects.notes: AOE attack, 3.9 ATK multiplier. High damage for AOE nuking.
10% TM fill per crit hit, stacks up to 50%. 5 crits = 50% TM boost for faster cycling.
10% MAX HP heal per crit hit, stacks up to 50%. 5 crits = 50% MAX HP healing for massive sustain.
Conditional: If this attack kills an enemy, gain Unkillable for 1 turn. Ensures survival for next rotation.

skills.book_value: 4 books total: +5% damage (×2), +10% damage, -1 CD. CRITICAL - brings CD to 3 turns and maximizes uptime.
skills.notes: Core AOE nuke. REQUIRES 100% C.RATE to maximize TM fill and healing (50% each). Conditional Unkillable on kill ensures survival. Book to 3-turn CD for frequent AOE pressure.

skills.name: Corrupted Sentinel
skills.description: [Passive Effect] Whenever this Champion's or an ally's Turn Meter is decreased, increases the damage of this Champion's next attack by 20% (stacks up to 100%). [Active Effect] Whenever this Champion's Turn Meter drops below 25% because of a Turn Meter reduction effect, places a [Block Debuffs] buff on this Champion for 2 turns and grants them an Extra Turn.

effects.notes: Passive component: +20% damage per TM reduction (self or ally), stacks up to 100%. Punishes TM control teams.
Active component: When TM drops below 25% from TM reduction, gain Block Debuffs for 2 turns. Counter to control + debuff combos.
Active component: Extra Turn granted when TM drops below 25%. Immediate retaliation opportunity.

skills.notes: ANTI-CONTROL PASSIVE. Turns TM reduction into damage buff (up to 100% = 5 TM reductions). When TM drops below 25%, gain Block Debuffs + Extra Turn for instant retaliation. Perfect counter to Siphi, Arbiter, Lyssandra, etc. Works on ALLY TM reductions too - benefits entire team.

forms.aura: Increases Ally ATK in all Battles by 30%
forms.comments: Sylvan Watchers Legendary damage dealer. Released September 2024. A-tier overall, Arena specialist. 10 books total (A2+A3 only, skip A1). Anti-control champion with passive that turns TM reduction into damage buff (up to 100%). Perfect counter to Odin/Leorius with 50% DEF ignore + Unkillable/Block Damage bypass. Requires 100% C.RATE for A3 sustain (50% MAX HP heal + 50% TM fill).

stat_priorities: Arena: 100% C.RATE (CRITICAL for A3), max C.DMG, high ATK%, SPD tuned for team

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Not recommended (2/10 rating) - no debuffs or utility for CB
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 100% C.RATE (mandatory for A3 sustain), 220+ SPD, max C.DMG, ATK%. Savage/Lethal sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 100% C.RATE, max C.DMG (aim 270+), high ATK%, SPD tuned to go after ATK buffer. Stoneskin for defense.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: Same as dungeons - 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, max damage stats. Excellent for waves with TM control bosses.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 100% C.RATE, max damage stats. Fills missing Legendary DPS role for Sylvan Watchers.

recommended_gear: Arena Offense (Primary): Savage (4-set) + Crit Damage OR Lethal (4-set) + Crit Damage. Focus DEF ignore and max damage.
Arena Defense: Stoneskin (4-set) + Speed/Crit Damage. Survivability for counter-turn retaliation.
Dungeons/DT: Savage (4-set) + Crit Damage OR Cruel (4-set) + Speed. Prioritize 100% C.RATE from substats.
Alternative: Merciless (4-set) for execute damage on low HP targets (synergizes with A2 chain attack).
Gloves: Crit Damage% (must have 100% C.RATE from substats)
Substats: C.RATE to 100% (MANDATORY), C.DMG, ATK%, SPD

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI is smart - prioritizes A3 AOE on cooldown, uses A2 for single-target nuking. No major AI issues reported.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Passive counters TM reduction teams (Siphi, Arbiter, Lyssandra) by converting TM reduction into damage buff (up to 100%) + Block Debuffs + Extra Turn when TM drops below 25%. A2 bypasses Unkillable and Block Damage buffs making Caoilte the perfect counter to Odin, Leorius, and defensive cheese comps. A3 conditional Unkillable on kill + 50% healing makes him very hard to kill in extended fights.

mechanics_advisory: Arena specialist and anti-control champion. REQUIRES 100% C.RATE for A3 to function properly (50% MAX HP heal + 50% TM fill on crits). Passive turns TM reduction into damage buff (20% per reduction, stacks to 100%) and grants Block Debuffs + Extra Turn when TM drops below 25% - perfect counter to TM control teams. A2 signature skill: ignores 50% DEF + bypasses Unkillable and Block Damage buffs = perfect Odin/Leorius counter. Chain attack on kill cleans up low HP targets. A3 AOE with self-sustain (50% heal + 50% TM fill on 5 crits) + conditional Unkillable on kill. 30% ATK aura for all battles. Booking priority: A2 first (4-turn CD), A3 second (3-turn CD), skip A1. Fills missing Legendary DPS role for Sylvan Watchers faction. Helmsmasher over Warmaster for nuking. Stoneskin for Arena Defense.
